name: Derelict Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the ancient designs used by Domain Explorarium spores. The continued existence - and location - of these blueprints is subject of many rumors. But you know the truth.

name: Remnant Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the autonomous droneship designs developed by Tri-Tachyon Corporation. Nobody holds delusions that these blueprints were destroyed, likely copied and hidden away in one of many TT blacksites. And you hold one such copy.
